channel.title: Need help
channel.description:
Any one know programe to edit .class files as text files? Dont talk shit about .java and compilers ;) I tried cavaj but it cant open my client files :confused: Look at error: when i try open my class8.class comes this table [img]http://talpink.lt/images/images/13019clent8openerror(1).PNG[/img]
Then if i press any of thoso button it comes like this and i cant do any thing
[img]http://talpink.lt/images/images/52259clent8openerror(2).PNG[/img] :mad:
please say how fix this error , or other good programe to edit .class files as text :)
